title: Library Database Management
description: A mini-project to showcase our ability to design, create, manage, and implement a SQL database to capture the real-world requirements of a functioning library. It is currently being updated from a Python Qt GUI to React.js and Tailwind CSS front-end

title: Find-Your-Matcha
description: A hackathon project created for matcha lovers made by self-proclaimed matcha connoisseurs! This full-stack application features user reviews, finds the closest cafes near you, and [another function].

title: Tetris Clone
description: A Tetris clone built with React, Vite, and CSS Module as a Web Application

title: This website!
description: A portfolio showcasing my projects, skills, experience, and a little bit about me!

title: Undercooked
description: A 2D Java Desktop App done through an introduction to software engineering course as a semester-long project.

title: RISC-V Emulator
description: An emulator for executing a subset of the RISC-V instruction set, capable of decoding RISC-V instructions.

title: Etch-A-Sketch
description: A browser-based sketchpad application with responsiveness and capable of interactive user features.
